name: Secret Of Smendes
description:
The story begins in 1849 in London where hard-working quarryman Benjamin Hill lives with his three children and his mother. His wife Mary had passed away when their daughter was born thirteen years ago and ever since Ben devoted his life to taking care of his family. The twins, 15-year old Earl and Carl worked as shoe polishers and paperboys, Sarah looked after neighbors children and their grandma did seamstress work and ironing to help with expenses.

 Since they all worked hard, they were able to live in a nice home and life was good. But in a big city like London, the diseases spread easily and one day Bens’ daughter Sarah got very sick. The needed treatment was very expensive and all things led to a desperate situation where Ben had to travel to Egypt to gain enough money to save his daughter.

Your job is to guide Ben through dark and mysterious pyramids, solve tricky puzzles and try not to get killed in evil traps that the ancient pyramid builders have placed in unexpected places. And every time when you die, you’ll have to start the level again. And again. Prepare to die a lot…

Try to collect the pieces of Smendes’s treasure and then hurry home to save your daughter.
